metadata.name: Portal of Light
metadata.description:
Emilio Ferro
Portal of Light

Portal of Light explores the imagery of ancient Egypt through the themes of threshold and of light as they relate to the deities of the worship of the sun such as Isis and Ra.

Token Utilities:
•	2 VIP passes to Forever Is Now III Private View & Cocktail (28.10.23).
•	Interview footage of artist explaining Forever Is Now installation.
•	Limited edition photographic print of Forever Is Now installation.
